answers.text:
Hi Sandra, 
There are many resources on the Knowledge Network that you may find useful as you create your own internship policies. 
-Model Internship Guidelines http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/4206/Model_Internship_Guidelines
-Here is a previously asked question about how to market your local government internship once you have created a program, http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/questions/question/21797
-Internships Possible Even During an Economic Downturn, is a document from Palo Alto, CA. 
icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/2389
-Here is a previously asked question on creating a formal internship program that includes documents and examples. http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/kn/Question/20117
I hope you find these useful and that when you have developed your own policy you post it on the Knowledge Network so others can learn from your example! 
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern
rsaywitz@icma.org
